definition[0]: if you grill something, or if it grills, you cook it by putting it on a flat metal frame with bars across it, above or below strong direct heat
definition[1]: to ask someone a lot of questions about something
example[2]: She never grilled her husband about his work.
definition[2]: a part of a cooker in which strong heat from above cooks food on a metal shelf below
example[3]: Pop it under the grill for five minutes.
definition[3]: a flat frame with metal bars across it that can be put over a fire, so that food can be cooked on it
definition[4]: a place where you can buy and eat grilled food
